content: Yepper, it is official. I just heard that ol' Kim Jung Ill has won again by 100% of the votes with 100% of all peoples in all 100% of the voting areas participating.. HEY!! we could learn something here... how do they do that? You know, that comatose person in the hospital... the quadriplegic who lives out in the sticks... etc, etc.. amazing. Since I am sure all peoples in N.Korea are literate I quess they didn't need a ballet with a smiley/frowny face as options.. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
